p: Vaccination status was known for 9215 (69%) of the 13 368 cases, with 2162 (23%) reported as having been vaccinated with either seasonal (2011 cases), pandemic (42), or both vaccines (109). The median duration of hospitalization did not differ between vaccinated and nonvaccinated patients (10.5 vs 10 days). Vaccination was preventive for fatal outcome (IRR, 0.86; 95% CI, 0.78â€“0.95) adjusting for reporting country, virus type, age, and sex.
